ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The author Asmaa Oubihi is extremely thankful to all coauthors for their valuable contribution. Moreover, many thanks go to Pr. Zidane Lahcen (Laboratory of Botany and Plant Protection, Ibn Tofail University, Kenitra, Morocco) for plant authentication. Special thanks are due to all members of the Laboratory of Pharmacology and Toxicology, Faculty of Medicine and Pharmacy, Mohammed V University, Rabat, Morocco, especially to Fatima Zahrae Bellaoui for her advice and help.
